attributes.additional_details: I have created a system/ device that shall allow weekly refuse collections to be resumed with out the need for bins to be replaced  and that also makes the process of recycling easier and greener over all. I want to give this idea away and just need it to be seen by the right people. The entire system would be able to cope with this simple addition, this would give us the return to weekly refuse collections. No profit shall be made for myself as I wish to simply see it in use. My petition is have a voice and be heard.
